data.title: Who Is Elsa Pataky? Everything to Know About the Actor Who Married Chris Hemsworth 13 Years Ago
data.meta_description: Here's everything you need to know about Chris Hemsworth's wife Elsa Pataky.
data.text:
Bad news: Chris Hemsworth is super married, which means he will never love you. Good news: His wife, model/actor/producer Elsa Pataky, is extremely cool, so you don‚Äôt need to be too bitter about it.

You probably know 47-year-old Elsa from the Fast and the Furious franchise, not to mention Snakes on a Plane, but there‚Äôs so much more to learn. Like, THE FACT THAT ADRIEN BRODY ONCE BOUGHT HER A CASTLE.

Take a break from trying to obtain a castle as a love token and deep dive into every single thing we know about Elsa. Go forth!

She‚Äôs from Spain and fights with Chris in Spanish to annoy him

Elsa was born in Madrid to a biochemist dad and a publicist mom and has been in a ton of Spanish movies and TV shows. Naturally, she‚Äôs fluent in Spanish (and English, Romanian, Italian, Portuguese, and French!), and argues with Chris in her native language to troll him.

‚ÄúWhen I hear the Spanish directed at me, it‚Äôs usually unfortunate, controversial, aggressive situations,‚Äù he told Ellen back in 2018. ‚ÄúSo I‚Äôm just thinking, ‚ÄòWhat is she saying right now?‚Äô and ‚ÄòWhat‚Äôs my comeback to this?‚Äô When we‚Äôre fighting, basically, which is never! If she gets angry enough she‚Äôll drop the English facade.‚Äù

Again, she has a solid film and modeling career

Elsa's appeared in tons of Spanish productions, not to mention some majorly mainstream international movies, like, ahem, The Fast and the Furious franchise. Most recently, however, Elsa starred in Netflix‚Äôs Interceptor as Captain J.J. Collins, a super-fierce Army captain who has to protect her base when enemies try to destroy it.

Oh, and did we mention she nabbed a role as Wolf Woman in 2022's Thor: Love and Thunder alongside‚Äîyep, you guessed it!‚ÄîChris. ü•∫‚ù§Ô∏è

She also was in a Netflix show...ABOUT MERMAIDS!

Elsa starred in Netflix‚Äôs very first Australian series Tidelands, aka a supernatural crime drama that low-key is full of MERMAIDS, so consider us invested, even all these years later.

She secretly kissed Chris in Thor

Elsa stood in for Natalie Portman during the final kissing scene in Thor: The Dark World thanks to a scheduling conflict. FYI, Natalie‚Äôs actually the one who broke the news after she reportedly told the NY Daily News, ‚ÄúHe was working in Hong Kong and I couldn‚Äôt get there because I was working on my own film. So they put his wife in my wig and costume, that‚Äôs why it was so passionate.‚Äù Watch the kiss below!

She used to date Adrien Brody and he casually bought her a castle

Elsa dated actor Adrien Brody back in 2006, and he went ahead and bought her a 19th-century mini-castle (fine, it‚Äôs technically an ‚Äúestate‚Äù) for her 31st birthday. ‚ÄúWhen I saw the castle, I asked Adrien, ‚ÄòIs this ours?‚Äô‚Äù she told Hello! (via the Daily Mail) in a cover interview. ‚ÄúHe said, ‚ÄúYes‚Äîwelcome home.‚Äù

Side note: The couple was extremely into wearing hats during their time together:

She and Chris got married three months after meeting

In other words, Chris swept Elsa off her feet! The pair was introduced by talent agent William Ward in 2010 and got married three months later in Australia during Christmas. Now they have three kids named Tristan, Sasha, and India!

‚ÄúThere was no light bulb moment. From the first time we met, we just made sense,‚Äù Chris told Elle back in 2015. ‚ÄúShe‚Äôs fun. She‚Äôs outgoing, and she has a sense of humor and a passionate attitude toward life, which is nice to try to keep up with.‚Äù

She fell in love with Chris‚Äôs voice first (didn‚Äôt we all?)

‚ÄúHis voice is Amazing! Before I met him, I heard his voice on the phone and that was what I loved. He was probably making it even deeper,‚Äù she said in 2016. ‚ÄúHe also has an amazing body, which I think is sexy.‚Äù

Chris‚Äôs career has put a major strain on their relationship

Not everything is sunshine and rainbows in Chris and Elsa‚Äôs relationship, and like any couple, they‚Äôve had their ups and downs over the years. ‚ÄúMy wife and I fell in love, had kids, didn‚Äôt really see each other for a few years, then fell back in love,‚Äù Chris told GQ in 2017. ‚ÄúIn terms of work, [Elsa has] certainly given up more than I have. She‚Äôd like me to step back and be at home with the kids more, and of course, I want that too. But I feel like I‚Äôm at this crucial point in my career‚ÄîI‚Äôve just got to set up for longevity or I‚Äôll slip off.‚Äù

Meanwhile, Elsa told Elle, ‚ÄúI think any time you start a family without knowing each other that much, it can be complicated... He was very young to be starting a family, and at the same time, he was juggling that with his career and it was sometimes difficult, there was so much going on. But he was always trying to be the best dad and has never failed to make me feel like his family is the most important thing to him and [going through that] is how we‚Äôve become so strong together.‚Äù

She‚Äôs super into fitness‚Äîand has the same trainer as Chris!
